text:
Здравейте, 

 

Приложено изпращам фактурите по направени към МЕТ Енерджи плащания в петък 22 Март (депозитите по анекс от 12.03.2024 и анекс 14.03.2024).

 

Поздрави,

Екипът на ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД

 



 

From: Marhova, Tsveta <tsveta.marhova@met.com> 
Sent: Monday, March 25, 2024 11:56 AM
To: Gas Trade <Gastrade@tibiel.com>; trade@tibel.com; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>
Cc: METBG_GASOPS <metbg_gasops@met.com>
Subject: MET BG: TIBIEL - Депозити по анекси, фактури и уточнение

 

Здравейте, 

 

Благодарим за направените плащания в петък (депозитите по анекс от 12.03.2024 и анекс 14.03.2024). 

 

В прикачените файлове ще откриете фактурите за тях, като ще бъдат прихванати от фактурите за второто плащане.

Останалите два депозита, които преведохте, ще върнем по сметката Ви, след плащане на фактурите за съответните доставки.

 

Поздрави,

 



 

Цвета Мърхова

Счетоводител 

 

МЕТ Енерджи Трейдинг България ЕАД

	
Мобилен: +359 899 70 86 86

Факс: +359 (0) 28 50 40 39

Е-поща: tsveta.marhova@met.com <mailto:tsveta.marhova@met.com> 

Сайт: www.MET.com <http://www.met.com/> 

	





Important notice:
This email may contain information that is confidential, legally privileged or otherwise protected from disclosure. This information is intended only for the use by the addressee. If you have received this e-mail in error, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or the taking of any action in reliance on the contents of the e-mail or attached files is strictly prohibited. In this event we would ask you to kindly delete this communication from your system and to contact us. Thank you!
MET GROUP has taken steps to ensure that this email (and any attachments) is free from computer viruses and the like. Any emails that you send to us may be monitored for the purposes of ascertaining whether the communication complies with the law and our policies. 

 

 

 

 

From: Atanasova, Stella <stella.atanasova@met.com <mailto:stella.atanasova@met.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, March 7, 2024 4:58 PM
To: Gas Trade <Gastrade@tibiel.com <mailto:Gastrade@tibiel.com> >
Cc: METBG_GASOPS <metbg_gasops@met.com <mailto:metbg_gasops@met.com> >
Subject: RE: Депозит

 

Здравейте,

 

Предлагаме депозитите и по двата договора за доставки през Q3 да бъдат приспаднати от фактурите за второто плащане за доставките през септември (чиито срок за плащане е 15.09.)

Моля да потвърдите.

 



С уважение,

Стела Атанасова



 

Stella Atanasova

Natural Gas Logistic and Operational Analyst

 

MET Energy Trading Bulgaria EAD

2, Pozitano str. Perform Business Center,

Floor 9, Sofia 1000

Mobile:  + 359 897 02 16 47

Office:   +359 2 8 50 40 39

Fax:       +359 2 8 50 40 39

E-mail: stella.atanasova@met.com <mailto:stella.atanasova@met.com> 

Web: www.MET.com <http://www.met.com/> 



 

 

From: Gas Trade <Gastrade@tibiel.com <mailto:Gastrade@tibiel.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, March 7, 2024 12:18 PM
To: Atanasova, Stella <stella.atanasova@met.com <mailto:stella.atanasova@met.com> >
Subject: Депозит

 

	Caution: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 

 

Здравейте,

Във връзка с депозита, относно сделките между Тибиел и МЕТ, може ли да поясните кога се освобождават депозитите?

Поздрави,

Търговски отдел Тибиел ЕООД





________________________________

Important notice:
This email may contain information that is confidential, legally privileged, or otherwise protected from disclosure. This information is intended only for the use by the addressee. If you have received this e-mail in error, you are hereby notified that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or the taking of any action in reliance on the contents of the e-mail or attached files is strictly prohibited. In this event we would ask you to kindly delete this communication from your system and to contact us. Thank you!
MET GROUP has taken steps to ensure that this email (and any attachments) is free from computer viruses and the like. Any emails that you send to us may be monitored for the purposes of ascertaining whether the communication complies with the law and our policies.
